section.p: You manage to shoulder your way through, and get right next to the lord. The noble's shoulders slump with resignation as he realises he'll have to grant whatever you ask of him. He gazes at you mournfully.
'How can I help, my poor friend?' he asks insincerely.

choices.choice: Teach you the game of bokh
Get you an audience with the Faceless King
Help you become an initiate of the Church of Ebron
Ask him to give you 500 Shards
